0.text: Innate: Periodically, Nocturne empowers his next basic attack to slash in a circle, dealing 120% AD physical damage to the target and nearby enemies and  healing himself for 13 − 30 (based on level) (+ 30% AP) per enemy hit. Against  minions, Umbra Blade's damage to secondary targets and healing are reduced by 50% and it applies  on-hit effects(bug) to all targets at 100% effectiveness.
0.html: Innate: Periodically, Nocturne empowers his next basic attack to slash in a circle, dealing 120% AD physical damage to the target and nearby enemies and healing himself for 13 − 30 (based on level) (+ 30% AP) per enemy hit. Against minions, Umbra Blade's damage to secondary targets and healing are reduced by 50% and it applies on-hit effects(bug) to all targets at 100% effectiveness.
markedPassages: healing
minions
on-hit

1.text: Umbra Blades can  critically strike against the primary target, modifying the physical damage dealt to「 (192.5% +  38.5%) AD. 」「 110% of the  critical damage of his basic attacks. 」
1.html: Umbra Blades can critically strike against the primary target, modifying the physical damage dealt to「 (192.5% +  38.5%) AD. 」「 110% of the  critical damage of his basic attacks. 」
markedPassages: critically strike
「 (192.5% +  38.5%) AD. 」「 110% of the  critical damage of his basic attacks. 」
(192.5% +  38.5%) AD
38.5%
「 110% of the  critical damage of his basic attacks. 」
「 110% of the  critical damage of his basic attacks. 」
critical damage

2.text: Basic attacks reduce Umbra Blades'   cooldown by 1 second, increased to 3 against enemy  champions and  monsters.
2.html: Basic attacks reduce Umbra Blades'  cooldown by 1 second, increased to 3 against enemy champions and monsters.
markedPassages: cooldown
champions
monsters

0.text: Active: Nocturne casts out a shadow blade in the target direction that leaves a Dusk Trail in its wake, dealing physical damage to enemies hit. Enemy  champions hit will leave a Dusk Trail behind while moving. Dusk Trails last 5 seconds and will slowly disappear afterwards.
0.html: Active: Nocturne casts out a shadow blade in the target direction that leaves a Dusk Trail in its wake, dealing physical damage to enemies hit. Enemy champions hit will leave a Dusk Trail behind while moving. Dusk Trails last 5 seconds and will slowly disappear afterwards.
markedPassages: champions

1.text: While on the Dusk Trail, Nocturne is  ghosted and gains  bonus attack damage and  bonus total movement speed.
1.html: While on the Dusk Trail, Nocturne is ghosted and gains  bonus attack damage and  bonus total movement speed.
markedPassages: ghosted
bonus attack damage
bonus attack damage
bonus total movement speed

0.text: Passive: Nocturne gains  bonus attack speed.
0.html: Passive: Nocturne gains  bonus attack speed.
markedPassages: bonus attack speed

1.text: Active: Nocturne gains a  spell shield for 1.5 seconds. Upon successfully blocking a hostile effect, Shroud of Darkness' bonus attack speed is doubled for 5 seconds.
1.html: Active: Nocturne gains a spell shield for 1.5 seconds. Upon successfully blocking a hostile effect, Shroud of Darkness' bonus attack speed is doubled for 5 seconds.
markedPassages: spell shield

0.text: Passive: Nocturne gains  90% bonus movement speed while facing nearby  feared targets.
0.html: Passive: Nocturne gains  90% bonus movement speed while facing nearby feared targets.
markedPassages: 90% bonus movement speed
feared

1.text: Active: Nocturne torments the target, forming a  tether between himself and the target for 2 seconds, during which the target takes magic damage every 0.5 seconds over the duration.
1.html: Active: Nocturne torments the target, forming a tether between himself and the target for 2 seconds, during which the target takes magic damage every 0.5 seconds over the duration.
markedPassages: tether

2.text: If the tether is not broken by the end of its duration, the target is  feared for a duration while being  slowed by 90%.
2.html: If the tether is not broken by the end of its duration, the target is feared for a duration while being slowed by 90%.
markedPassages: feared
slowed

0.text: Active: Nocturne terrorizes all enemy champions,  nearsighting them for 6 seconds. He can recast Paranoia for the same duration after 0.25 seconds.
0.html: Active: Nocturne terrorizes all enemy champions, nearsighting them for 6 seconds. He can recast Paranoia for the same duration after 0.25 seconds.
markedPassages: nearsighting

1.text: Recast: Nocturne  dashes with  displacement immunity to the target enemy champion, dealing physical damage upon arrival.
1.html: Recast: Nocturne dashes with displacement immunity to the target enemy champion, dealing physical damage upon arrival.
markedPassages: dashes
displacement immunity

2.text: Nocturne can cast any of his abilities during the dash.
2.html: Nocturne can cast any of his abilities during the dash.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Nocturne can cast any of his abilities during the dash.
